Static Private Attributes

static const std::string A_fname = "GenPointsParameters.C"
 Name of source file.

Detailed Description

Unlike the base class, the string parameters here are all cstrings to support the popt library for parsing command line options

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SimSite3D::GenPointsParameters::hphob_method_t

Enumerator:
THREE_PROTEIN_ATOMS  If 3+ atoms are close ==> hphob pt.
THREE_MORE_HPHOB  If 3 more hphob than hphil are close.
ATOM_CENTERS  Use centers of Cs and Ses if they have no polar neighbor.
BURIED_SURFACE_AREA  not implemented yet.

const char **  argv 
) [private]

Given the command line arguments, parse them using the popt library.

Parameters:
argc Number of command line arguments
argv Array of C-style strings holding the command line arguments
Returns:
True if parsed successfully and may continue, else false

Don't think this needs to be private
